summary.span: 命名空間提供建置於 Microsoft Active Directory 服務工作周邊的高階抽象物件模型。

span.span: The namespace provides a high level abstraction object model that builds around Microsoft Active Directory services tasks.

summary.span: 樹系、網域、站台、子網路、磁碟分割及結構描述等 Active Directory 服務概念都是物件模型的一部分。

span.span: The Active Directory service concepts such as forest, domain, site, subnet, partition, and schema are part of the object model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空間用來將 Active Directory 管理工作自動化。The namespace is used to automate Active Directory management tasks. 無法用來存取位於 Active Directory 或任何其他目錄服務中的資料。 is not used to access data that resides within Active Directory or any other directory service. 命名空間應用於此用途。The namespace should be used for this purpose. 命名空間主要供熟悉使用 Visual Basic .NET 或 C# 執行 .NET Framework 程式設計的應用程式開發人員使用。The namespace is intended for use by application developers who are familiar with .NET Framework programming using Visual Basic .NET or C#. 目錄服務程式設計的知識也很有用。Knowledge of directory services programming is also helpful. 是的一部分[!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)]，且支援任何作業系統上，[!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)]相容。 is part of [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)] and is supported on any operating system that [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)] is compatible with. 類別、 方法和屬性中的許多命名空間使用程式碼存取安全性選項。Many of the classes, methods, and properties in the namespace use the code access security option. 這表示程式碼存取安全性要求只在 just-in-time 編譯期間發生，而且只能在呼叫組件上而不是整個呼叫堆疊，執行此要求。This means that the code access security demand only occurs during just-in- time compilation and that the demand is performed only on the calling assembly and not up the entire call stack. 因為這個緣故，呼叫端不應該傳遞至不受信任的程式碼在執行階段的這個命名空間中建立的物件。Because of this, callers should not pass objects created from this namespace at runtime to untrusted code.
